title: Scotland City Break in Aberdeen's Busy West End with Lobby Bar
description: Experience Scotland's 'Granite City' for yourself when you stay at Holiday Inn Express Aberdeen City Centre, an IHG Hotel. The hotel is ideally placed within short walking distance to Union Street, the city's premier shopping precinct with buzzing bars, restaurants and theatres. When you're not chasing cultural experiences, stay in and enjoy a sip of malt whisky, beer or wine at the lobby bar on leather sofas, or kickstart each day with a buffet-style breakfast in the Great Room dining area.
